headline: Goldman Told Clients to Go Long Copper a Day Before Price Plunge

headline: Stock Losses Extend on Tariffs, Swiss Franc Drops: Markets Wrap

headline: Figma shares rise premarket after stock soars by 252% in debut
summary: Investing.com - Shares of Figma rose in premarket trading on Friday, following a blockbuster debut from the design software maker in the prior session.
